summary: AFTER HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS SINCE THE PURCHASE OF OUR 1996 BLAZER IN 8/2002, THEY COMPLETELY QUIT WORKING DURING A RAINSTORM WHILE TRAVELING ON FRIDAY FEB 16. THERE IS A RECALL FOR A SIMILAR PROBLEM WITH BLAZERS BUT AFTER CALLING A LOCAL DEALER I WAS TOLD IT DID NOT APPLY TO OUR VEICLE. THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS NOW INSTEAD OF WORKING INTERMITANTLY DO NOT WORK AT ALL AND MAKE A BUZZING NOISE.
